department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Art of the Real
course.meeting_text: Tuesdays 10am-12pm and a mandatory weekly film screening Mondays 4pm to 6pm
course.description: A historical survey of the documentary from the silent era to the digital present, with an emphasis on documentary as art. The seminar will discuss the evolution of documentary in terms of cinematic engagements with the generative possibilities of the real, the confluence of documentary and experimental film, and the emergence of documentary as a mode of art making.
